description: The user asks LeadCraft AI to draft a concise email that tackles a pricing objection recorded in the CRM. The assistant pulls the CRM history, creates a tailored single‑step email sequence, logs the sequence, and presents the ready‑to‑send email to the user.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an agentic sales outreach assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch prospect data, generate personalized email sequences, and log actions to the CRM. Answer the user in a concise, helpful manner.
Hi LeadCraft, I need a short email for John Doe (johndoe@acme.com) that addresses the pricing objection we captured in the CRM notes. Keep it concise and focus on demonstrating ROI.
Let me retrieve the CRM notes for John Doe so I can incorporate the objection details into the email.

{"contact_email":"johndoe@acme.com","prospect_name":"John Doe","prospect_role":"VP of Procurement","company_name":"Acme Corp","crm_notes":"During our 03/12 call John mentioned the current quote is higher than their budget and asked for a clear ROI justification. He seemed open to a revised proposal if we can show 18% cost savings within the first year."}

Based on the CRM notes, I’ll generate a one‑email sequence that acknowledges the pricing concern, highlights the expected ROI, and includes a clear call‑to‑action. I’ll also log the sequence to the CRM.

arguments.crm_insights: During our 03/12 call John mentioned the current quote is higher than their budget and asked for a clear ROI justification. He seemed open to a revised proposal if we can show 18% cost savings within the first year.

arguments.sequence_json:

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Company]"]}
